Doreen Amata (a mụrụ ụbọchị nke 6 n'ọnwa Mee nke afọ 1988 na Legos, Naijiria ) bụ nwanyị Naijiria na-egwu egwuregwu bụ ọkachamara na ihe omume ị wuli elu
Amata nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi Olimpik nke afọ 2008, rite ọkwa nke iri na isii n'ogo niile
O ritere ọla edo maka obodo ya nke West Afrịlka na 2007 All-Africa Games
Amata zọrọ Naịjirịa asọmpi na asọmpi Olimpik nke afọ 2016, mana o rughị agba nke ikpeazụ
Ọ bụ onye nnọchite anya Naijiria  n'emume mmechi ahụ
Ihe omume ọ kacha mee ọfụm na ya bụ ihe omume nke mita 1.95 Ọutdoors (n'Abuja n'afọ 2008, na Daegu n'afọ 2011) na mita 1.93  (na Banska Bystrica n'afọ 2016).
